description:
From our office in Mishawaka, Indiana, attorneys at the May Oberfell Lorber law firm provide invaluable counsel and support to clients throughout the greater South Bend metro region and surrounding areas. We help those who have legal needs involving any of the following:

  • Estate planning, wills and trusts
  • Probate and estate administration
  • Elder law
  • Banking and finance
  • Commercial real estate
  • Corporate and business law
  • Family law and divorce
  • Labor and employment law
  • Insurance defense
  • Personal injury and medical malpractice
  • Mediation and arbitration
  • Appeals

Regarded as one of our region's premier full-service legal practices, our law firm has an additional office in Dowagiac, Michigan. During our time in practice, we have achieved unequalled success helping our clients obtain the favorable outcomes they seek for their important and pressing legal matters as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible.

Combined, our attorneys have more than 160 years of legal experience, and we have earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from our peers for our outstanding professionalism and legal abilities. Perhaps more importantly, we have also received numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients, and you can rely on us to be there with you each step of the way to help you significantly increase your odds of achieving positive results.

To find out more about how we can best serve your legal needs at May Oberfell Lorber, you can contact our law office to schedule a consultation. We also currently offer virtual consultations in an effort to help keep you safe and healthy in these uncertain times.
